displaytitle: Untitled, from the Series "Gioco come gioco"
medium: Non-water-soluble ink or acrylic on ivory wove paper
markings: Watermark: top left, top right, bottom center: CMFabriano 100 / 100 Cotton; verso, lower right, in black: Antonio Buttigone, Ispettore del Macinato stamp (two crossed keys before a tent with a cross on it in an oval with a signature and initials)
inscribed:
Inscribed recto, lower center, in graphite: Bendini; inscribed
verso, lower right, in pen and blue ink over dealer’s stamp:
ARCH. 124-a; center, in black ink: Tempera sintetica e colla
su carta fabriano in 57 x 76-1990 / serie gioco come gioco /
V Bendini
signed: Signed in graphite, lower center: Bendini

titles.title: Untitled, from the Series "Gioco come gioco"

bibliography.boilertext: "Acquisitions of the Art Museum 1992," Record of the Art Museum, Princeton University 52, no. 1 (1993): p. 36-83.
bibliography.citation: "Acquisitions of the Art Museum 1992," Record of the Art Museum, Princeton University 52, no. 1 (1993): p. 36-83., p. 43, p. 47 (illus.)

bibliography.boilertext: Laura Giles, Lia Markey, Claire Van Cleave, et. al., Italian Master Drawings from the Princeton University Art Museum, (Princeton, NJ: Princeton University Art Museum, 2014).
bibliography.citation: Laura Giles, Lia Markey, Claire Van Cleave, et. al., Italian Master Drawings from the Princeton University Art Museum, (Princeton, NJ: Princeton University Art Museum, 2014)., p. 229, app. no. 11 (illus.)

caption: Vasco Bendini (Italian, 1922–2015), Untitled, from the Series "Gioco come gioco", 1990. Non-water-soluble ink or acrylic on ivory wove paper; 57 × 75.8 cm. Gift of Marcella Valentini (x1992-13)
